member.name: F:JelleDruyts.Mollom.Client.MollomClient.TimestampFormat
member.summary: The format string for the time stamp.
member.remarks: The timestamp format should be "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ" according to the rules of the W3C but Mollom doesn't accept this (yet).

member.name: M:JelleDruyts.Mollom.Client.MollomClient.CheckContent(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks the content of a message, comment or post and classifies it as ham, spam or unsure.
member.param: The title of the post.
The post body.
The name or nick of the user who entered the post.
The email address of the user that entered the post.
The url of the user that entered the post.
The current IP address of the user who entered the post.
Your websiteâ€™s user id of the user who entered the post.
The OpenID of the user that entered the post. Multiple OpenIDs can be given, separated by whitespace.
A unique ID to identify the current session.
member.returns: The result of the check for the content that was submitted.
member.exception: The XML-RPC response contained an XML-RPC fault.
member.remarks: All parameters are optional and can be passed as or an empty string. The more information that is provided, the more accurate the classification.
